moduleTitle: Essential Data Analytics Tools: Convex Optimisation
prerequisite: CS1010/CS1010E/CS1010S/CS1010X and MA1101R and {MA1104 or MA2104 or MA2311}
moduleDescription: Convex optimisation is an indispensable technique in dealing with high-dimensional structured problems in data science. The module covers modelling examples; basic concepts for convex functions and sub-gradients; gradient and sub-gradient methods; accelerated proximal gradient methods; stochastic block coordinate descent methods; Lagrangian duals; splitting algorithms and implementations.
